gcci.text: At an average spot-market price of $3.14/hour, H100 utilization must stay above ~55% for capex payback, pushing buyers to prioritize long-term supply agreements over spot procurement.

gtpi.text: With an average input token price of $1.38 per 1M, the token market reflects intense price compression driven by model competition and hardware efficiency gains, pressuring margins.

gagl.text: An annual AI-related load of 120 TWh implies substantial grid strain and rising baseload needs, making dispatchable low-carbon sources like nuclear essential for reliability and decarbonization.

aipi.text: AI capex remains robust on the back of falling unit costs, but forward-looking investors are closely monitoring deployment pace to guard against growth overshoot and bubble risk.
